1: <pb/><t>Chixpetok,</t> <t>ka bixoj ri Ajawaxel</t> <t>ruc' quicotemal;</t> <t>chujbixon che ri ch'ukul kech</t> <t>xukuje' ka Colonel.</t>
2: <t>Chujoc chuwäch ruc' maltioxinic,</t> <t>chekabixoj bix che u ya'ic u k'ij.</t>
3: <t>Rumal rech</t> <t>chi ri Ajawaxel are' nimalaj Dios,</t> <t>ri nimalaj Ajawinel ri c'o paquiwi'</t> <t>conojel ri diosib.</t>
4: <t>Ri are' e c'o ri e u najil</t> <t>ri u pam ri ulew pa u k'ab;</t> <t>e rech ri juyub ri sibalaj naj</t> <t>e elinak chicaj.</t>
5: <t>Ri plo rech are',</t> <t>are' c'u xbanowic;</t> <t>¡cuc' ri kas e u k'ab</t> <t>xunuc' ri chaki'j ulew!</t>
6: <pb/><t>Chixpetok, xucuxuj chujk'ijilanok;</t> <t>kaxucu' kib chuwäch ri Ajawaxel,</t> <t>are' c'ut ri are' xujbanowic.</t>
7: <t>Are' ka Dios, ri uj uj u tinimit;</t> <t>uj chij rech ri u yuk'bal. <pb/>Chitampe' camic ri cubij are' chiwe:</t>
8: <t>“Micowirisaj ri iwanima',</t> <t>jas ri xc'ulmataj pa Merib;</t> <t>jacha' ri k'ijol pa Masa,</t> <t>pa ri chaki'j uwo sak,</t>
9: <t>aretak xinquic'ambejej ri e i mam,</t> <t>pune' xquil tak ri chac ri xebenbano.</t>
10: <t>Cawinak (40) junab xinoyowar</t> <t>cuc' we winak ri',</t> <t>xinbij c'ut:</t> <t>‘We winak ri'</t> <t>sibalaj quinajtajisam quib chwij</t> <t>¡man quequinimaj ta ri e nu takomal!’</t>
11: <t>Rumal ri' xinban ri chi'nic</t> <t>ri kas cäban na</t> <t>pa ri woyowal chi man queboc ta na</t> <t>pa ri nu c'olbal ri quinuxlan wi.”</t>
